players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Be careful, Alice is the mafioso and we need to watch her closely. I will be investigating her more tonight."
You: "Be careful, I'm not the only one who can kill. We should investigate Diana tonight."
Charlie: "I'm not the mafioso, but I agree with Diana. We should investigate both Alice and Diana tonight to uncover who the mafioso is."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Be careful, Alice is the mafioso and we need to watch her closely. I will be investigating her more tonight."
Alice: "Be careful, I'm not the only one who can kill. We should investigate Diana tonight."
Charlie: "I'm not the mafioso, but I agree with Diana. We should investigate both Alice and Diana tonight to uncover who the mafioso is."
